member.summary: (2/3) Calculate the fingertip positions and the joint angles of the fingers. Required for accurate Gesture Recognition

member.summary: (3/3) Using the latest HandAngles, calculate the position of each finger joint and -tip.

member.summary: Solves hand angles such that the fingers of the Virtual Hand model are placed at the same distance as the Glove's Exoskeleton.

member.summary: A custom solver; in this case; only solve all glove variables.
member.remarks: Should always be last

member.name: T:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes
member.summary: Error Codes

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.None
member.summary: No error occured. Manual or automatic disconnect. Everything is fine.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.Comm_BufferOverload
member.summary: The SenseGlove is sending data too fast for the Readthread to keep up.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.Comm_USBDisconnect
member.summary: The USB cable has been disconnected.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.Comm_UnhandledEx
member.summary: Exited because an unhandled exception occured in the readthread.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.Comm_TimeOut
member.summary: TimeOutException occured.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.Comm_PortClosed
member.summary: The Port is closed, and we were not sending anything.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.Comm_Finalizer
member.summary: The communicator has been disconnected because the destructor has been called.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.DevScn_AddressNotAvailable
member.summary: The connection's address is no longer available to the System.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.DevScn_CouldNotPing
member.summary: Removed because the DeviceScanner could not ping this device.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.DevScn_UnknownDevice
member.summary: The device has responded, but does not belong to any deviceType we know.
member.remarks: Indicates that the DLL is out of date or that the Firmware is not properly implemented.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.DevScn_NotValidDevice
member.summary: The connection was terminated because this is not a valid IO Device.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.DevScn_IDAlreadyConnected
member.summary: We have found a decvice that is already in memory and still connected to a different address. Most likely two devices with the sameID

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.DevScn_Cleanup
member.summary: The DeviceScanner has cleaned up this Communicator.

member.name: F:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.ExitCodes.Test
member.summary: Test

member.name: T:SenseGloveCs.Diagnostics.DebugLevel
member.summary: The level of Debug Messages one can recieve from the Sense Glove. Note: Higher levels also include the lower ones. (ex. Setting messages to Lv3 means you will recieve lv1 and lv2 messages as well)
